Posts.EditableText:
Good evening everyone.
First of all: i am absolutely happy to see that textadventures are still alive!!!
Thanks to MTV and Larry Laffer i had my first english lessons.

A few nights ago i had an absolutely crazy idea and this idea now wants to become real.
For that i found Quest and though i have not tried to create the textadventure content for
my game, i have some technical questions.

Is it possible to add a parallelx jquery or any other jquery plugin to the html head and body?
if i as example want to add a NIVO slideshow to one of my rooms, how can i do that?

I know how to add a nivo slideshow to html via jquery but with my test game at quest i can
not find any html or css file that i might be able to edit.
Thanks in advance and congrats to this great product,
carlos
Posts.HTML:
Good evening everyone.
First of all: i am absolutely happy to see that textadventures are still alive!!!
Thanks to MTV and Larry Laffer i had my first english lessons.

A few nights ago i had an absolutely crazy idea and this idea now wants to become real.
For that i found Quest and though i have not tried to create the textadventure content for
my game, i have some technical questions.

Is it possible to add a parallelx jquery or any other jquery plugin to the html head and body?
if i as example want to add a NIVO slideshow to one of my rooms, how can i do that?

I know how to add a nivo slideshow to html via jquery but with my test game at quest i can
not find any html or css file that i might be able to edit.
Thanks in advance and congrats to this great product,
